attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
dont know about anyone else but i carnt fill in the forms for council housing because everyone wants refrances and for me that includes a £20 charge each one which there is always at least 2 
PLEASE SIGHN THIS

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
